body:
Comment 2: 
Why is the certificate not trusted by Windows?
Package crypto/tls asks Windows for the root
certificates to use in trust chains, namely the
system stores "ROOT" and "CA" using
CertOpenSystemStore and CertEnumCertificatesInStore.
The root CA Google is using is
"Equifax Secure Certificate Authority".

Do you know whether your system lists that as
one of its trusted certificates?  Does it work to visit
https://code.google.com/p/go/ (note the https) in
Internet Explorer on your machine?

Thanks.
Russ
